Home.title: Admission for the 2024-2025 academic year has begun
Home.description: Our goal is to train personnel who can improve their lives and those around them with their knowledge and potential, who can think critically in all aspects through education.

FormTab.description_2: Secondary education and foreign language certificate
FormTab.description_3: Direction, specialization and form of education

PersonalInfo.title: Personal Information
PersonalInfo.logout_desc: Are you sure you want to logout?

EducationInfo.title: Educational Information
EducationInfo.collage_region_address: Region or city where the educational institution is located
EducationInfo.collage_district_address: District where the educational institution is located
EducationInfo.diploma_desc: Upload JPEG, JPG, PNG, PDF files no larger than 5MB
EducationInfo.certificate_title: Do you have a foreign language certificate?
EducationInfo.certificate_desc: Applicants with the following international or national English language certificates are exempt from entrance exams: IELTS – 5.5 and above; TOEFL IBT – 46-59 and above; TOEFL ITP – 450 and above; CEFR – B2 and above.
EducationInfo.certificate_name_label: Upload a copy of your certificate
EducationInfo.certificate_name_desc: Upload JPEG, JPG, PNG, PDF files no larger than 5 MB

ChooseDirection.title: Choose direction
ChooseDirection.accept_desc: I have filled out all the information in the application with my own hand, I guarantee that my information is correct. If I have incorrect or false information about myself I understand that the university admissions department has the right to reject my application if I enter it.

ApplicantInfo.title: Applicant record sheet
ApplicantInfo.note_desc: The applicant is personally responsible for the accuracy of the information on this note.

Done.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
Done.success_title: Your application has been successfully submitted.
Done.additional_docs: We will contact you if additional documents need to be provided.
Done.exam: You will be notified of the exam or interview date.
